…recognize the  birthday of Helen Dramer Jarrell. Helen will turn 100 years old on July  3rd.

…Lyndsay Gray.

Enlisting in 2006, Ms. Gray served over a decade as a radiology  technologist.

After training at Fort Sam Houston and Fort Leonard Wood, she was  stationed at Walter Reed, where she led the mammography department and  was selected as a cadre for the Combat Medical Badge course.
